## Question 1

#### Loading and cleaning Trash Wheel data:

```{r}
trash_data =
  read_excel("./data/Trash-Wheel-Collection-Totals-7-2020-2.xlsx",
             sheet = "Mr. Trash Wheel",
             range = "A2:N535") %>%
  filter(Dumpster != "NA") %>%
  mutate_at("Sports Balls", round) %>%
  janitor::clean_names() %>%
  rename(dumpster_id = dumpster)
```
